childMarkdownRemark.html: This was my first class developing mobile apps for IOS. It was a fun experience that involved convincing my Windows computer to think it was a Mac! This App is a Stopwatch that has working pause/play/reset buttons. It also has a Night mode button that changes the entire view/color scheme of the app for better visibility between night and day. Although it was a single page app, it has a very nice, clean look to it's design and all the Swift code handling the stopwatch works very well.
